instructions.advice: Follow the following preparatory steps to pair your connected devices within your network:
instructions.advice1: Prepare the device that you want to add within your network.
instructions.advice2: Please read the instructions for your device to know the manipulation to be carried out during the pairing procedure to add your object.
instructions.ready: When ready, click on the button

success.deviceName: The names generated are not very meaningful, we advise you to rename your equipment (s):
success.warning: (If you leave a field empty the default name will be kept)

failure.deviceNotFound: We did not find your device ðŸ˜Ÿ
failure.followInstructions: Make sure you have followed the steps for pairing your device.
failure.retryPairingProcedure: To restart the pairing procedure, click on the button

finish.congratulation: Congratulations, the following equipment has been added to your network.
